import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ArticleList from './ArticleList'; const MyComponent = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [isDropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const [category, setCategory] = useState('sport'); // Default category const [showSearchResult, setShowSearchResult] = useState(false); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); // Add loading state const toggleDropdown = () => { setDropdownOpen(!isDropdownOpen); }; const handleSearch = async () => { // Update the category state with the search term setCategory(searchTerm); // Fetch articles based on the search term setLoading(true); try { let categoryToFetch = searchTerm || category || 'sport'; const response = await axios.get(`http://172.20.10.13:3000/api/data?category=${categoryToFetch}`); setArticles(response.data.articles); setLoading(false); setShowSearchResult(true); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data:', error); setLoading(false); setShowSearchResult(false); } }; return (
